mapper.select: SELECT t.task_title, t.task_salary, t.task_begin_time, t.task_estimated_duration, t.task_location, ts.task_phase_describe FROM task_ongoing ongoing JOIN tasks t ON ongoing.task_id = t.task_id JOIN task_status ts ON ongoing.task_phase = ts.id WHERE 1 = 1 and ongoing.employer_id = #{userId};

SELECT t.task_title, t.task_salary, t.task_begin_time, t.task_estimated_duration, t.task_location, u.name, ts.task_phase_describe FROM task_ongoing ongoing JOIN tasks t ON ongoing.task_id = t.task_id JOIN user u ON ongoing.laber_id = u.id JOIN task_status ts ON ongoing.task_phase = ts.id WHERE 1 = 1 and ongoing.employer_id = #{userId};
